subject: Re: FW: DeWalt Electric Pressure Washer Warranty Claim

full_threads.body:
Hi Bonnie,

We have successfully done the following updates:

  • Change date format to DD/MM/YYYY
  • Updated form recipients based on the Google Sheet

Kindly check and let us know if you have any further queries.

Hi Joy,

Thanks for that. I have added my comments in the sheet.

Thanks

Bonnie Sudirwan

Marketing Communications Manager





bsudirwan@mayohardware.com.au



http://www.mayohardware.com.au/



0408 331 966



Customer Service: 1300 360 211

Hi Bonnie,

Here's a list of the current recipients on the forms:

Check Google sheet here

We'll send you steps in a bit. For now, you can send us the updated recipient list so we can make the necessary changes.

Hi all,



Please see the attached email. It looks like all forms are going to the ATG email address? Can you please show me how I can check the email setup of all forms as I need to go through them all to fix this…



Thanks



Bonnie Sudirwan

Marketing Communications Manager





bsudirwan@mayohardware.com.au



http://www.mayohardware.com.au/



0408 331 966

Hi Bonnie,

We appreciate you for flagging these form-related concerns to us.

Rest assured, this has been forwarded to our team and will let you know this is updated.

Hi team, Further to the below, I have received the following feedback:
  • It looks like the online warranty claim form has had some changes since the website change. Some small like the date format being in MM/DD/YYYY instead of DD/MM/YYYY, and "Generator" where "Pressure washer" should be.
Can you please ensure this is fixed ASAP. Thank you Bonnie Sudirwan Marketing Communications Manager bsudirwan@mayohardware.com.au http://www.mayohardware.com.au/ 0408 331 966 Customer Service: 1300 360 211 CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE: This e-mail message, including any attachments, is for the sole use of the intended recipient(s) and may contain confidential and privileged information or otherwise be protected by law. action.text: Allie Borcena assigned to Joy T

full_threads.body:
Hi Team,

Can you please remove atg@mayohardware.com.au from the Dewalt warranty claims. These should go to dewalt@mayohardware.com.au and customerservice@mayohardware.com.au

Are you able to send me a list of forms connected to the Mayo Hardware website and emails they are being directed to, please? Is this possible? It doesn't seem like the new forms are matching the old ones in relation to the emails they are being directed to.

Thanks

Bonnie Sudirwan
Marketing Communications Manager

www.mayohardware.com.au
